children.textKey:
__RAW__# Create a new route
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/addRoute \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"route": "about-us"}'

__RAW__# List all pages with metadata
curl http://yoursite.local/management/listPages \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"

__RAW__# Delete a route (removes PHP + JSON files)
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/deleteRoute \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"route": "old-page"}'

__RAW__# Get page structure with node identifiers
curl http://yoursite.local/management/getStructure/page/home/showIds \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"

# Get summary view (tree overview)
curl http://yoursite.local/management/getStructure/page/home/summary

__RAW__# Full translation analysis (missing + unused + recommendations)
curl http://yoursite.local/management/analyzeTranslations \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"

# Validate specific language
curl http://yoursite.local/management/validateTranslations/fr \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"

__RAW__# Add Spanish language
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/addLang \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"code": "es", "name": "Espa√±ol"}'

__RAW__QuickSite supports two modes: multilingual (multiple language files) and mono-language (single default.json). Use setMultilingual to switch between modes. Translations are automatically synced when switching.

__RAW__# Switch to mono-language mode
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/setMultilingual \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"enabled": false}'

# Switch back to multilingual mode
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/setMultilingual \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"enabled": true}'

__RAW__# Upload an image (multipart/form-data)
curl -X POST "http://yoursite.local/management/uploadAsset?category=images" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -F "file=@/path/to/logo.png"

# Categories: images, scripts, font, audio, videos

__RAW__# Set favicon from uploaded image
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/editFavicon \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"imageName": "my-logo.png"}'

__RAW__# Update page title for a specific language
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/editTitle \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "route": "about",
    "lang": "en",
    "title": "About Us - My Company"
  }'

__RAW__# Create a 301 redirect
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/createAlias \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "alias": "/old-about-page",
    "target": "/about",
    "type": "redirect"
  }'

# Create internal (transparent) routing
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/createAlias \
  -d '{"alias": "/info", "target": "/about", "type": "internal"}'

__RAW__# Create optimized production build
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/build \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "public": "www",
    "secure": "app",
    "space": ""
  }'

# Result: Creates build_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS/ folder + ZIP archive

__RAW__# Move site to subdirectory (e.g., /web/)
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/setPublicSpace \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"destination": "web"}'

# Site now at: http://domain.com/web/
# Restore to root with empty destination: {"destination": ""}
__RAW__QuickSite v1.4 includes comprehensive build management commands to list, inspect, clean up, deploy, and download builds.

__RAW__# List all builds with metadata
curl http://yoursite.local/management/listBuilds \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"

# Get detailed info for a specific build
curl http://yoursite.local/management/getBuild/build_20250101_120000 \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"

# Delete a specific build
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/deleteBuild \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"name": "build_20250101_120000"}'

# Clean up old builds (preview with dry_run)
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/cleanBuilds \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"before": "2025-01-01", "dry_run": true}'
__RAW__The deployBuild command copies a build to your production paths. Use absolute paths and be cautious with the overwrite option.

__RAW__# Deploy a build to production
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/deployBuild \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "name": "build_20250101_120000",
    "publicPath": "/var/www/production/public",
    "securePath": "/var/www/production/app",
    "overwrite": false
  }'

# Get download URL for a build ZIP
curl http://yoursite.local/management/downloadBuild/build_20250101_120000 \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"

__RAW__# Generate a new token with full access
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/generateToken \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"name": "Flutter App", "permissions": ["*"]}'

# Generate read-only token
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/generateToken \
  -d '{"name": "Public API", "permissions": ["read"]}'

__RAW__# List all tokens (values are masked)
curl http://yoursite.local/management/listTokens \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"

# Revoke a token
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/revokeToken \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -d '{"token_preview": "tvt_abc1...xyz9"}'

__RAW__# List all available projects
curl http://yoursite.local/management/listProjects \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"

# Switch to a different project
curl -X PATCH http://yoursite.local/management/switchProject \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -d '{"project": "myproject"}'

# Create a new project
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/createProject \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -d '{"name": "newsite", "activate": true}'

__RAW__# Export current project to ZIP
curl http://yoursite.local/management/exportProject \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"

# Download the exported file
curl http://yoursite.local/management/downloadExport/quicksite_2025-12-30.zip \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  --output backup.zip

# Import project from ZIP (multipart form)
curl -X POST http://yoursite.local/management/importProject \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -F "file=@backup.zip" \
  -F "activate=true"

__RAW__# Get all command documentation
curl http://yoursite.local/management/help \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"

# Get help for specific command
curl http://yoursite.local/management/help/editStructure \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"
